timeline.message: Issue #1426 Implement synchronization of current metadata state into categorical attributes
Issue #1426 Provide tests on the process of synchronization of the metadata into categorical attributes
Issue #1426 Refactoring regarding code style and static analyzers violations

timeline.bodyText: Let's user @RestController and remove @responsebody from all methods
timeline.author: mzueva

timeline.bodyText: I'd suggest to use common path /categoricalAttribute and do not add load/loadAll/delete/deleteValue suffixes. To distinguish load and loadAll we can use @GetMapping(params = { "attributeKey"}).
timeline.author: mzueva

timeline.bodyText: I'd suggest to allow only one attributeKey for this method since we already have a method to loadAll. And let's move to path from request params
timeline.author: mzueva
mzueva

timeline.bodyText: Also, let's do not action to path and use params in DeleteMapping annotation
timeline.author: mzueva

timeline.bodyText: Let's make it POST, since this request is not idempotent
timeline.author: mzueva

timeline.bodyText: Let's introduce a separate class CategoricalAttribute and use it instead of Map<String, List<String, String>>. It will increase readability of the code and may be useful if decide to introduce more complex ACL permissions.
timeline.author: mzueva

replies.bodyText: Done, using List<CategoricalAttribute> instead of Map<String, List<String>> and return single CategoricalAttribute, when loading by one key
replies.author: Wedds

timeline.message: Issue #1426 Use correct annotation for controller and `POST` mapping for sync method
Issue #1426 Accept only one value, when loading values for a key
Issue #1426 Introduce CategoricalAttribute entity to store system dictionaries values
Issue #1426 Add test on the conversion of string pairs to list of categorical attributes
Issue #1426 Change the way of responding to requests, when trying to load a dictionary for a non-existent key
Issue #1426 Change the way of responding to requests, when trying to load a dictionary for a non-existent key
Issue #1426 Unify endpoint for attribute values removal
Issue #1426 Fix naming for db migration file
